name: Rob's Adventure
description:
GAME IDEA - ROB ADVENTURE

  • Theme: climb + sky (from the bottom to sky)
  • Story: Rob wants to go to heaven baut there are spikes on the way and lava to reach to 100 steps and he is in heaven
  • Mechanics: Climbing by wall jump (No more ladder)
  • Concept Art: 

  • Reach to 75 = clouds
  • Goal: Reach 100 platforms to win. There will be a Heaven Gate waiting at the end. The character only has 1 life.
  • ROB:                                
  • 1 power-up:
  • INVINCIBLE - last 1 hit with obstacles
  • Random - 50% = instance death, 50% instant boost 5 plats up 30 sec on a random plat near the rob 1 block above
